docs.text: BaGet Getting Started Install .NET Core Run git clone https://github.com/loic-sharma/BaGet.git Navigate to .\BaGet\src\BaGet Start the service with dotnet run Open the URL http://localhost:5000/v3/index.json in your browser Pushing Packages You can push a package with this command: dotnet nuget push -s http://localhost:5000/v3/index.json newtonsoft.json.11.0.2.nupkg
docs.title: BaGet

docs.text: Install .NET Core Run git clone https://github.com/loic-sharma/BaGet.git Navigate to .\BaGet\src\BaGet Start the service with dotnet run Open the URL http://localhost:5000/v3/index.json in your browser
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: You can push a package with this command: dotnet nuget push -s http://localhost:5000/v3/index.json newtonsoft.json.11.0.2.nupkg
docs.title: Pushing Packages

docs.title: Running BaGet on Azure

docs.text: Running BaGet on Docker Build the docker image: docker build . -t baget Create a file named baget.env with the content: # The default API key is NUGET-SERVER-API-KEY ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development ApiKeyHash=658489D79E218D2474D049E8729198D86DB0A4AF43981686A31C7DCB02DC0900 Storage__Type=FileSystem Storage__Path=/var/baget/packages Database__Type=Sqlite Database__ConnectionString=Data Source=/var/baget/baget.db Search__Type=Database Create a folder named baget-data Run: docker run --rm --name nuget-server -p 5555:80 --env-file baget.env -v $(pwd)/baget-data:/var/baget baget-nuget-server:latest Push your first package with: dotnet nuget push -s http://localhost:5555/v3/index.json -k NUGET-SERVER-API-KEY newtonsoft.json.11.0.2.nupkg Browse your packages at http://localhost:5555/
docs.title: Docker

docs.text: Build the docker image: docker build . -t baget Create a file named baget.env with the content: # The default API key is NUGET-SERVER-API-KEY ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development ApiKeyHash=658489D79E218D2474D049E8729198D86DB0A4AF43981686A31C7DCB02DC0900 Storage__Type=FileSystem Storage__Path=/var/baget/packages Database__Type=Sqlite Database__ConnectionString=Data Source=/var/baget/baget.db Search__Type=Database Create a folder named baget-data Run: docker run --rm --name nuget-server -p 5555:80 --env-file baget.env -v $(pwd)/baget-data:/var/baget baget-nuget-server:latest Push your first package with: dotnet nuget push -s http://localhost:5555/v3/index.json -k NUGET-SERVER-API-KEY newtonsoft.json.11.0.2.nupkg Browse your packages at http://localhost:5555/
docs.title: Running BaGet on Docker
